atk-vin02a43:2_1: nidānena ca niddesena ca saddhiṁ pucchissāmi. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ kati āpattiyoti
atk-vin02a43:2_2: yāni tattha samukkaṭṭhāni uttamāni padāni vuttāni, tesaṁ samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ uttamapadānaṁ
atk-vin02a43:2_3: saṅkhepato kati āpattiyo hontīti. Yena yena hi padena yā yā āpatti paññattā, sā sā
atk-vin02a43:2_4: tassa tassa padassa āpattīti vuccati. Tena vuttaṁ “samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ kati āpattiyo”ti.
atk-vin02a43:2_5: Dve āpattiyoti ūnavīsativassaṁ upasampādentassa pācittiyaṁ, sesesu sabbapadesu dukkaṭaṁ.
atk-vin02a43:3_0: Tissoti “nassantete vinassantete, ko tehi attho”ti bhedapurekkhārānaṁ uposathakaraṇe
atk-vin02a43:3_1: thullaccayaṁ, ukkhittakena saddhiṁ uposathakaraṇe pācittiyaṁ, sesesu dukkaṭanti evaṁ
atk-vin02a43:3_2: uposathakkhandhake tisso āpattiyo. Ekāti vassūpanāyikakkhandhake ekā dukkaṭāpattiyeva.
atk-vin02a43:4: Tissoti bhedapurekkhārassa pavārayato thullaccayaṁ, ukkhittakena saddhiṁ pācittiyaṁ, sesesu dukkaṭanti evaṁ pavāraṇākkhandhakepi tisso āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a43:5_0: Tissoti vacchatariṁ uggahetvā mārentānaṁ pācittiyaṁ, rattena cittena aṅgajātachupane
atk-vin02a43:5_1: thullaccayaṁ, sesesu dukkaṭanti evaṁ cammasaṁyuttepi tisso āpattiyo. Bhesajjakkhandhakepi
atk-vin02a43:5_2: samantā dvaṅgule thullaccayaṁ, bhojjayāguyā pācittiyaṁ, sesesu dukkaṭanti evaṁ tisso āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a43:6: Kathinaṁ kevalaṁ paññattimeva, natthi tattha āpatti. Cīvarasaṁyutte kusacīravākacīresu thullaccayaṁ, atirekacīvare nissaggiyaṁ, sesesu dukkaṭanti imā tisso āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a43:8_0: Samathakkhandhake chandadāyako khiyyati, khiyyanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ, sesesu dukkaṭanti
atk-vin02a43:8_1: imā dve āpattiyo. Khuddakavatthuke attano aṅgajātaṁ chindati, thullaccayaṁ, romaṭṭhe
atk-vin02a43:8_2: pācittiyaṁ, sesesu dukkaṭanti imā tisso āpattiyo. Senāsanakkhandhake garubhaṇḍavissajjane
atk-vin02a43:8_3: thullaccayaṁ, saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhane pācittiyaṁ, sesesu dukkaṭanti imā tisso āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a43:9_0: Saṅghabhedebhedakānuvattakānaṁ thullaccayaṁ, gaṇabhojane pācittiyanti imā dve āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a43:9_1: Samācāraṁ pucchissanti vutte vattakkhandhake ekā dukkaṭāpattiyeva. Sā sabbavattesu
atk-vin02a43:9_2: anādariyena hoti. Tathā pātimokkhaṭṭhapane. Bhikkhunikkhandhake appavāraṇāya pācittiyaṁ,
atk-vin02a43:9_3: sesesu dukkaṭanti dve āpattiyo. Pañcasatikasattasatikesu kevalaṁ dhammo saṅgahaṁ
